bugs.summary: Change the return type of nsLayoutUtils::GetTransformToAncestorScale to MatrixScalesDouble
Enable zero copy hardware decoded video on all GPU on Window on nightly
Disable Wayland compositor integration on beta and release
In WebKit's bugzilla instance, the CC list's "Edit|Add..." autocomplete dropdown has an unexpectedly transparent background
Assertion failure: false (Two layers that scroll together have different ancestor transforms) print preview fission transformed iframe
`context-value` stroke attributes in SVG glyphs are handled incorrectly
nsIFile::Append{Relative} should reject paths with ".." on all platforms
The bookmarks popup is not flush with the bookmark star icon on the URL bar
Add HTML Fragments Preprocessor function to build system
